title: Ashura Day
text: • It's 4 rakah salah, prayed with 2 rakah at a time.
• Pray anytime between Fajr and Dhuhr
• In 1st rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Káfirún](Quran:109)
• In 2nd rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Ikhlás](Quran:112)
• In 1st rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Ahzáb](Quran:33)
• In 2nd rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Munáfiqún](Quran:63)
